English: Defend Kolguyev!
BAZA TO ALL UNITS. HOLD YOUR POSITIONS AS BEST YOU CAN. REINFORCEMENTS ARE ON THEIR WAY. GOOD LUCK COMRADES! BAZA OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, WE CAN'T HOLD THE SOUTHERN BEACH. THERE'S TOO MANY OF THEM. WE'LL TRY TO HOLD THEM AT THE SOUTHERN BASE. OUT.
BORIS TO BAZA, THE ENEMY IS COMING TO THE EASTERN BEACH IN STRENGTH. WE NEED THOSE REINFORCEMENTS RIGHT NOW OR WE HAVE TO RETREAT. OVER!
BAZA TO BORIS, THE REINFORCEMENTS ARE STILL A WAY OFF. YOU'LL HAVE TO HOLD FOR NOW. OVER.
NEGATIVE BAZA. WE HAVE TO LEAVE THE BEACH AND REGROUP AT THE EASTERN BASE. OUT.
LEONID TO ALL UNITS, WE ARE SORRY BUT WE CAN'T HOLD ANY LONGER. THE ENEMY HAS TAKEN THE BEACH AND THE BASE. WE'RE RETREATING TO THE FUEL BASE. OVER.
UNDERSTOOD LEONID. ROMAN, REINFORCE THE DEFENCE TO THE SOUTH, THE ENEMY WILL TRY TO MAKE A BREAKTHROUGH FOR THE LAST BEACH, DO NOT LET HIM! OVER.
ROMAN TO BAZA. UNDERSTOOD. WE'RE ON OUR WAY. OUT.

BAZA TO ALL UNITS. THE REINFORCEMENTS ARE NOT COMING. THE ENEMY HAS DISRUPTED OUR SUPPLY LINES. RETREAT IMMEDIATELY TO THE NORTH, I REPEAT, RETREAT IMMEDIATELY TO THE NORTH. WE'VE LOST THIS BATTLE, COMRADES. BAZA OUT.
ROMAN TO BAZA, THE ENEMY FLOODED THE WESTERN BEACH. WE WILL NOW TRY TO HOLD THE WESTERN BASE. OUT.
